relevant_findings.initial_examination: Significant left facial asymmetry, pain on mastication, limitation of incisor opening, no localized mass.
relevant_findings.diagnostic_imaging: CT scan showed an expanding, ground glass lesion in the left mandible.

physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Initially improved with indomethacin; however, condition worsened with diarrhea, abdominal pain, and weight loss two years later.

relevant_findings.initial_examination: Right mandible swelling, induration, and tenderness.
relevant_findings.diagnostic_imaging: CT scan showed a ground-glass lesion in the right mandible.

physical_examinations.changes_over_time: CT scans showed marked improvement in the size of the mandibular lesion during treatment with antibiotics and NSAIDs.
